data.text:
The Nike Sport Research Lab's Running Analysis uses motion-capture camera technology with scientific expertise to provide a personalized understanding of how you run, why it matters, and what exercises/footwear solutions may be best for you. Learn more at heartbreak.run/nsrl.

The Nike Sport Research Lab (NSRL) has over 40 years of experience understanding the science of how our bodies move. The team applies scientific insights to develop new products and services with the goal of helping athletes of all levels. Headquartered in the Lebron James Building on Nike's campus in Beaverton, Oregon, the NSRL operates in an 85,000-square-foot, state-of-the-art research facility with 400+ motion capture cameras, a full NBA basketball court with player and shot tracking, environmental chambers, and more.

Heartbreak is proud to partner with the NSRL to make its technology & expertise accessible to runners in our community.
